game.shortDescription: There's a new girl in town! You live a mundane otaku life until one day, your new neighbor turns everything upside down. Experience a story filled with romance, comedy, and a touch of personal drama!

reviewHighlights.text: This is so ass not only shes ugly asf (thanks to the piercings) then also the porn art looks bad can't even goon to this bad game i don't even like wo...
